roles_permissions_description: Understand what each user role can do
danger_zone_description: Clear data and other destructive actions
preferences_description: Change language and other app settings
new_pin_description: Leave blank to keep existing PIN
data_operator_customization_description: Here are the customizations available for the Data Operator role.
backdated_always_description: Data Operator can add entry on any past date
backdated_never_description: Data Operator cannot add entries on past date
backdated_one_day_description: Data Operator can entry on today and day before
hide_balance_description: Data operators will not be able to see net balance and download reports
hide_other_entries_description: Data operators will not be able to see entries done by other members
allow_editing_description: Data operators will be able to edit entries
backup_data_description: Download all your application data to a single JSON file. Keep this file safe.
restore_data_description: Restore your data from a previously downloaded backup file. This will overwrite all current data.
restore_warning: Restoring from a backup will completely overwrite all existing data in the app. This action cannot be undone.
delete_all_rupeebooks_description: Permanently delete all RupeeBooks from the database for all users. This action cannot be undone.
delete_all_businesses_description: Permanently delete all businesses from the database for all users. This will not delete the RupeeBooks inside them.
delete_all_members_description: Permanently delete all members except for the main super admin account (JATIN GADHIYA). This will also delete all data owned by those members.
reset_application_description: This action will permanently delete all businesses, RupeeBooks, and members (except the super admin). It will reset the application to its initial state. This cannot be undone.
all_rupeebooks_description: View and manage all RupeeBooks across the entire application.
language_preference_description: Choose the display language for the application.
language_changed_description: The application language has been updated.
